scripts._comment_postinstall: Only generate OpenAPI types if src directory exists (build stage), skip in production where only built output is present
scripts.postinstall: test -d src && (openapi-typescript https://developer.themoviedb.org/openapi/64542913e1f86100738e227f -o src/types/tmdb.ts && openapi-typescript https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Prowlarr/Prowlarr/develop/src/Prowlarr.Api.V1/openapi.json -o src/types/prowlarr.ts) || echo 'Skipping postinstall in production'
